title: New: PHOSPHOR – Blossom / Cold Hearted
content:
I don’t mean to stereotype, but PHOSPHOR could only be from London.

The appearance, the slightly pretentious name, and the new-age sound all point towards hailing from the capital city. That said, who cares where a group come from when they make music as good as these two new tracks from the electro-wave duo. Heavily shoegaze influenced, Blossom is a sleazy My Bloody Valentine-esque number; relentless and unforgiving in sound, but utterly fantastic. On the flip-side Cold Hearted is another brooding, mysterious effort; walls of guitars block out any glimmer of optimistic light whilst the female vocals are elegant and vivaciously dominating. Check out Blossom and Cold Hearted below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
